I remember waiting up for 0.16. I can't believe how much has changed since then. I also can't believe it's been almost 3 years.

> 
> How are we all doing today? ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

I'm having a nice holiday in Beijing, and it's awesome. But the hype is unbearable!
The server migration is back to text only...

> 
> The server migration is back to text only...

Not for me...
Did you close your browser and go back to it? I had the image 20 minutes ago and now it's just text.

> 
> How are we all doing today? ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

I know we're all dying to get on 1.0 but I just want to say congrats guys. While it isn't the end this a major hurdle on a 4 year road you've all been on, and thanks for allowing us to take this journey with you through early access.

It's been one hell of a ride seeing what the game would become and I can't wait to see what's next for ksp, but also what's next for all of you. Thanks again for this awesome game and to everyone here who helped to foster this amazing community.

Let's make this a day to remember ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
It is several hours closer to the release then when I last posted!
This hype is torturing me hard. It feels like I was run over by the hype train. I want it so much that it's painful..
